content.rendered:
The following documents are required to be attached with the admission form:

  • A photocopy of the Birth Certificate for admission in LKG, UKG, and Grade 1
  • A photocopy of the valid passport of the student with a valid residence visa page, and valid Emirates ID (both sides)
  • A photocopy of parent(s) valid passport and valid residence visa page and valid Emirates ID (both sides)
  • Original Emirates ID of student
  • Original Emirates ID of parent
  • Four (4) white background passport size photographs of student

Local (UAE) Transfer Case

  • Original School Leaving Certificate/Transfer Certificate (TC) in English for those coming from other schools within the UAE.
  • Students transferring from UAE local schools are admitted after the approval of the relevant education authority.

Note: Discontinuation of studies should not exceed two (2) weeks

International Transfer Case

  • The original TC must be attested by the following:
    • Ministry of Education or the relevant education authority of the Country
    • Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Country
    • UAE Embassy of and in the Country
    • Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Dubai
    • Consulate General of Pakistan in Dubai

Note: For students coming from outside of UAE, the discontinuation period should not exceed one (1) month.

For admissions in Grade 11 and 12:

  • Students seeking admission in Grade 11 are required to submit NOC/Migrations/Equivalence Certificate in case of transferring from a board other than FBISE.
  • Marksheet of SSC examination will be required for admission to college classes (HSSC-I and HSSC-II, Grade 11 and 12)

WITHDRAWAL

Parents or guardians who want their children/wards to leave the school must give a written withdrawal notice at least a month in advance; otherwise, a surcharge of up to one-month fee shall be paid by the applicant for clearance.
